Features/Skills
Feat Count: General: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Archetype): 1; Half-Orc (Racial Trait): 3
Feats: Expanded Arcana; Leaf Singer; Lingering Performance; Stone Singer; War Singer Half-Orc Features: Cavewight; Darkvision; Half-Orc Ability Adjustment; Orc Blood; Orc Ferocity; Weapon Familiarity (Orc Double Axe); Weapon Proficiency (Falchion/Greataxe) Bard Features: Arcane Insight; Arcane Investigation; Armor Proficiency (Light); Bardic Performance; Careful Teamwork; Countersong; Detective; Dirge Of Doom; Distraction; Eye For Detail; Fascinate; Inspire Competence; Jack-Of-All-Trades; Lore Master; Shield Proficiency; Simple Somatics; Suggestion; True Confession; Weapon Proficiency (Simple/Longsword/Rapier/Sap/Short Sword/Shortbow/Whip)
Feature Notes:
Bardic Performance: May use Bardic Performance effect 23 rd/dy
Darkvision: 60' b/w vision in darkness
Leaf Singer: Dbl range or area of effect of audible Bardic Performance in forest/+2 Bardic Performance DC vs. feys
Lingering Performance: Bardic Performance effects continue for 2 rd after performance ends
Orc Blood: Counts as both orc and human for racial effects
Stone Singer: Dbl range or area of effect of audible Bardic Performance underground, also affecting creatures w/tremorsense/+2 Bardic Performance DC vs. earth creatures
War Singer: Dbl range or area of effect of audible Bardic Performance in clash of 12 or more combatants/+2 Bardic Performance DC vs. orcs
Skills (90 ranks, max 10 each):
Appraise: (int) 10 (+16) Knowledge (Dungeoneering): (int) 2 (+8) Sense Motive: (wis) 10 (+19)

Climb: (str) 10 (+13) Perception: (wis) 2 (+11) Survival: (wis;cc) 10 (+11)
Craft (Traps): (int) 5 (+11) Perform (Percussion): (cha) 1 (+5) Use Magic Device: (cha) 10 (+14)
Disguise: (cha) 2 (+6) Perform (Wind): (cha) 5 (+9)
Heal: (wis;cc) 5 (+6) Profession (Soldier): (wis) 2 (+6)
Languages: Aklo; Auran; Common; Elven; Orc; Terran; Undercommon
Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Check Penalty: -2 Dex- and Str-based skills
Eye For Detail: +5 Knowledge (Local)/+5 Perception/+5 Sense Motive
Intelligence Language Adjustment: +3
Intelligence Skill Ranks Adjustment: +30
Arcane Insight: May find and disable magical traps/+4 vs. disguises
Cavewight: +1 Knowledge (Dungeoneering) (underground)/+1 Survival (underground)
Eye For Detail-1: +5 Diplomacy (gather information)
Jack-Of-All-Trades: May use any skill untrained
Lore Master: May take 10 on any ranked Knowledge skill; may take 20 1/dy
True Confession: May use 3 rd Bardic Performance and successful Sense Motive to cause target to reveal lie or compulsion (DC 16 Will neg)

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 6; B2: 4; B3: 3; B4: 1 Spell DC: B: 11
Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1
Simple Somatics: Suffers no arcane spell failure in light armor
Arcane Insight: +4 caster level to overcome protection vs. divination
Arcane Investigation: Has access to additional spells
Careful Teamwork: R30' May use 3 rd Bardic Performance to give allies +2 Initiative, Perception, Disable Device, Reflex saves, AC vs. traps, and flat-footed AC for 1 hr
Countersong: R30' Bardic Performance gives Perform check vs. sonic magic
Dirge Of Doom: R30' Bardic Performance inflicts shaken
Distraction: R30' Bardic Performance gives Perform check vs. visual magic
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Fascinate: R90' Bardic Performance holds 4 creatures spellbound (DC 16 Will neg)
Inspire Competence: R30' Bardic Performance gives allies +3 skill checks
Suggestion: May use Suggestion effects on 1 fascinated creature (DC 16 Will neg)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Leaf Singer Feat: Requires charisma (currently 13) >= 13, bardic performance feature (currently 1) and race (currently Half-Orc) matches 'Elf'
Stone Singer Feat: Requires charisma (currently 13) >= 13, bardic performance feature (currently 1) and race (currently Half-Orc) matches 'Dwarf'
